郮字的基本解释

郮
zhōu
古国名。

郮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōu］
［《廣韻》職流切，平尤，日。］
古国名。夏商时部落，黄帝后，故地在今陕西岐山南。

郮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1273第15
【廣韻】職流切【集韻】之由切，?音周。【玉篇】故國，黃帝後所封國也。

郮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
郮字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōu］
["Guangyun" career stream cut, Pingyou, Japan. ]
Ancient country name. The Xia-Shang Dynasty tribe, the Queen of the Yellow Emperor, was born in the south of Qishan, Shaanxi today.

[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郮; Kangxi strokes: 15; page number: page 1273 15
[Guang Yun] Vocational stream cut [Ji Yun] by cut,? Sound week. [Jade articles] The homeland, the country was also named after the Yellow Emperor.
